title: how is this guy not perma banned riot??? and how has he gotten to lvl 30?
body:
he intentionally feeds every game and made me nearly lose ranked game?
we all reported him and still gets in my game straight after ?? his account name is killtaiwanese069 

i just find if completely f****ed up that hes not perma banned and yet i have had previously banns for legit saying the word shit like twice in game ???

replies.body:
You cannot ban someone for playing bad, maybe that is just their skill level.
Maybe you should be more supportive and help him become a better player by telling him where he is going wrong. 

Unless he is deliberately walking into the enemy turret to give kills over to the opposition, (I have seen this happen) Then that might result in a player being banned.

But for feeding? You need to be more specific.
But you can still ban supports taking smite.

FYI they have since created a policy for players like the Nunu and Singed.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/EtXQhs5J-weore-updating-our-policy-so-unusual-play-styles-dont-get-14-day-bans

The tl;dr is that there will be more communication with these players rather than just escalating them through the existing system which doesn't really do anything to solve the problem.
I know they did, its just they were banning people who were trying to play seriously because they took smite, but int feeders are getting off free.

Fair enough just wasn't sure if you've seen it. I must agree the intent feeding detection could be better, but remember that the few of these kinda players that were banned were extreme cases (many hundreds of reports). If they're hurting the experiences of that many players Riot has a responsibility to step in in some for or another.

Again, not discrediting the intent feeding argument, just trying to offer perspective on those more public ones.

The player in question legit uses bots every game, the bot just pushes doesn't recall and feeds most game. The feeder post the videos online on YouTube all in Chinese. He records and bots in the games with sometimes one video being about 10 hours long and even that is sped up so almost 15 hours straight of feeding. There has been threads of reddit on him, not that popular I think. The YouTube channel goes back to almost a year I think of 1000s of hours of passive inting up to 10,15 hours at a time. If you go to the YouTube channel bare minimum there a videos posted of 6hours being very short for this player of them passive, inting feeding on all servers non stop. He just sets up a bot, sets up a recorder and must do something else for that day. Then post it all online.
If this is known then why isn't he banned?

Because Riot uses a stupid automated detection system which can't pickup trolling! 

Anyone who tries to defend this I can prove it!

All you need to go is hit a few minions and move around and the stupid system won't be able to pick it up!

I just got a 10 game ban for an apparent negative attitude. One of the games that was in my chat log was me and an enemy team mate having a laugh together spamming emotes and having some general light hearted banter. Hardly anything remotely close to verbal abuse. Infact no one called anyone anything and it was all in good fun. Someone obviously got salty over it and reported me, probably because they lost. I reckon it's because I called the enemy team's jungler a noob in our own team chat the system picked that up as me being toxic. Who knows. It's just pathetic.

An automated system also cant pick up on human emotions and can easily takes things out of context.

Because the automated system is shithouse. Pure and simple. The problem is as mentioned earlier, how does an automated system differentiate between a bad player and someone doing it intentionally? Simple, it can't. The only thing that works ok atm is the chat ban and thats because it's easy for an automated system to pickup on keywords, phrases etc.

I've been saying this for a long time now and Riot simply turn a blind eye to it. Feed all day long, ruin people's games but don't you DARE say anything half toxic to them otherwise you'll be the one receiving a chat ban. Pretty sad, but that's league for you.

You get punished harder and faster for chatting then feeding, passive inting. Ruining the game completely is punished less then something where someone can mute and have more control over. Read over what I've posted on why I got 2, 2 week bans a couple of months ago, and the rioter response in the support ticket. You can chat all game but as sons as someone finds it annoying and reported, punishment soon follows, however feeding passive inting non stop hours on end and nothing happens.

Firstly you should remove his name as you arent allowed to name and shame on here. But yes he should be perma banned, last 4 ranked games he ave 0-25-3. No level of skill should let someone die that many times and get a kda like that

When you realise this feeder is still a higher rank than you T_T
